text: Ana'ma hute'za atirami'za vu'za, nagri kema ruhantagi naza vahe'ma fri'naza zamavufaga ome zamagesnazana, anama fri'naza vahe zamavufagafima mani'naza kanimo'za nofrisnageno, tevema nezamarea tevemo'enena asura osugahie. Maka vahe'mo'zama ana vahe zamavufagama kesnazana, hinimnage huno zamagotegahie.
